meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>blink</kanji> is a <vocabulary>blink</vocabulary> and a <vocabulary>wink</vocabulary> as well, depending on how many eyes you use.
readingMnemonic: <vocabulary>A wink</vocabulary> is all it takes to get the "<reading>Ma butter</reading>" (まばた) from the store. It's hidden, and they only bring it out if you do the wink.
